title: Deutsche Bank splits investment bank in two as part of overhaul
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
FRANKFURT, Oct 18 (Reuters) - Deutsche Bank is splitting its investment bank into two separate units as part of a broad strategic overhaul o...
